name: Land's Wrath
description: You gather in the natural energy of the land around you and focus it into a sudden eruption of earth in a 40 ft radius, centered on a point within range. All creatures caught in the blast must make a DEX save against your Move DC, taking 5d6 + MOVE ground damage on a failure, or half as much on a success.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 4d10 at level 5, 6d10 at level 10, and 8d12 at level 17.

contest.effect: Startles all of the Pokemon to act before the user.
